column2: Job Description  Equity Capital Market - Pantomath Position : Associate/ Sr. Associate     Experience : 4-6/6-8 years in ECM respectively   Educational qualification : CA/CS/MBA is preferred Roles & Responsibilities: Client facing role where the candidate will be working closely with internal and external stakeholders to ensure the successful execution of ECM transactions Should have worked on at least 4-6 ECM transactions including IPOs Coordinate and collaborate with various internal teams, including investment banking, legal, compliance, finance, and external service providers, to facilitate the smooth execution of IPOs and other equity transactions Preparation of Offer Documents for IPOs / QIPs / Rights Issue / Buybacks / Open Offers / Delisting / Debt Issues / Corporate advisory mandates Conducting due-diligence, and working closely with legal and compliance teams to ensure accuracy and completeness of offer documentsand other transaction-related materials including pre/post processes for IPOs/ QIPs / Rights Issue / Buybacks etc. In-depth knowledge of SEBI ICDR Regulations, LODR, Buyback regulations, open offer regulations, companies act and other regulations relevant for ECM transactions Ensure compliance of offer documents with applicable securities regulations, SEBI and stock exchange rules, and listing requirements throughout the equity capital market execution process. This would also include, coordinating with legal and compliance teams to address any regulatory issues Coordinating with SEBI, stock exchanges and other DD agencies if any to ensure timely completion of the entire process End-to-end deal execution of Equity Capital Market Transactions Excellent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple transactions and meet tight deadlines. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for detail. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with internal and external stakeholders at all levels. Preparation of financial models, Information Memorandum, other marketing literature, presentations, etc. for institutional investors Support for making pitches / presentations for corporate clients and investors

column2: Role & responsibilities   Client Onboarding/Transitions/Conversions - IC1 under significant direction, conducts assigned operational and data analysis activities related to client onboarding/transitions/conversions.  Prepares for and onboards clients, opens and closes accounts and/or analyzes, reconciles and reviews incoming or outgoing data for accurate translation to platform.  Determines the best set-up for client accounts and establishes or makes updates to client accounts.  Prepares for the opening of new accounts once due diligence on KYC and AML has been completed.  Reviews the Account Opening Checklist for accuracy. Closes off accounts by first checking for any pending activity or balances remaining in the account.  Conducts pre-transition/conversion testing and quality review of client data. Escalates findings to senior colleagues or assigned transition consultant.  Responsible for the daily workflow of client transition/conversion operational and data analysis, monitoring each component of the transition/conversion including data requirements, regulatory and compliance impact and data transfer, coordination with third-parties, etc.  Assist with managing transitions/conversions by developing transition/conversion plans along with timelines, assessing key resource requirements and identifying critical paths.  Coordinate with different departments to complete tasks and documentation in time.  Communicate progress to team and escalate issues or potential project delays. Provides project management to maintain and support less complex client relationships.  Works closely with and provide support for Transition Consulting, Relationship Management and Account Management teams to ensure knowledge of client priorities and preferences and a seamless client experience.  No direct reports. May have people management responsibilities in some geographies. Responsible for small, less complex clients or supports non-complex project phases and contributes to the achievement of team objectives.  Experience in client-facing or project management preferred. Minimum Experience - 1 Year   Looking for Immediate Joiners only. Interested candidate can share their resume - rupali.padme@kiya.ai

column2: Specific skill sets Must have complete understanding of Loyalty applications to support reward Earn and Burn programs. Basic understanding of Financial reconciliation and payouts for the Loyalty programs  Knowhow of Loyalty applications and business models. Need to have worked on applications for Rewards and loyalty pay backs. Methods of transaction reporting in both Batch mode and Online such as APIs, ISO messages etc. should be well understood. Should have worked on implementation of API based inquiry and redemption solutions  Should know the industry practices and programs riding on rewards calculations. Preference will be given to individuals having worked on either Loyalty management system of Cards or Rule based engines supporting rewards programs. Concepts of GST, invoicing, accounting would be preferred for respective functions to be designed for the Loyalty solution implemented. Well versed with jargons used relating to reward based programs or solutions. Should have hands on experience of User Acceptance Testing and ability of helping testing teams on scripting and review of logs etc. Exposure to card concepts and card schemes will be additional advantage.   JOB SUMMARY    Project management and Business Analysis for Loyalty Programs and Solution implementation. Will be managing all new product initiatives and support business requirements on enhancing the existing products listed.  End to End project management from analysis business requirement, documentation of requirement, solution evaluation keeping in view effort estimation versus business justification, quality analysis of the solution through testing, process documentation and risk analysis and implementation / rollout planning and execution including end user training / communication.   Detailed Responsibilities:     Project Management   Takes assigned project from original concept through final implementation.  Defines project scope and objectives and publishes project status. Creates and maintains project schedules by developing project plans and specifications, estimating time requirements, establishing deadlines, monitoring milestone completion, tracking all phases of the project product/service lifecycle, providing timely reporting of issues that impact project progress, coordinating actions, and resolving conflicts.  Should be able to document, prioritize and track requests (changes, enhancements, etc.) and coordinate with the Change Control Board (CCB).  Conducts project meetings with teams and stakeholder and management to review project deliverables and deadlines.  Provides single point of contact for assigned projects and coordinates interaction and communication during cross functional programs Assists in identification and assignment of internal resources and external contractors to meet varied project requirements. Prepares routine reports relating to the specific projects ongoing. Business Analysis, Reporting and Documentation  Works with appropriate personnel to allocate personnel time to project tasks and to track progress of their work.  Assesses and prepares to address the operational impacts, workflow, training, etc. issues of a project.  Reviews, analyzes, and creates detailed documentation of business systems and user needs, including workflow, program functions, and steps required to develop or modify computer programs.  Coordinates the development of all approved versions of business and functional specifications for specified applications.  Reviews use cases and other technical documents with IT project staff to ensure business requirements are adequately reflected in technical planning documents.  Prepares documents for Operation Risk Committee and Steering Committees for decision on process finalization, cost approvals and product launches. Manages training for the new product or process implementation and identifies any training needs with respect to process change or product launch. Actively participates in development of training material and process maps for all the change requests managed. Manages the process documentation and drives process adherence. Should know how to prepare, review, edit and release Standard Operating Procedures or Processes and Workflow documents Quality Assurance and Testing  Acts as a test lead for all small and big projects and manages outsourced testing team UATs on enhancement and production fixes. Should provide support on test scripting, resource allocation and tracking for all UATs to closure. Displays leadership needed to instill a team-oriented, client-driven, results-driven team. Coaches and develops the testing resources reporting. Defines, develops and implements quality assurance practices and procedures, end user test plans and other QA assessments.  Ensures that all tests are conducted and documented according the standards agreed upon by the business unit and IT.  Responsible for the overall success of testing, including tracking of bug reports and change requests and ensuring their timely resolution and results verification and release sign-off. Coordinates groups of service providers or support teams who assist in bug fixes and explains the defects to relevant stakeholders who either contribute in fixing them or are to decide the change in solution to fix such defects..

column2: Senior Analyst  Process CoE Department:  Process CoE???   Reports to:  Manager  Process CoE Role To help in building the detailed process maps, following the BPMN mapping standards, based on defined timelines. Review the controls in processes and identify process gaps across the EQ Group. This role will be critical in process standardization and re-engineering. Work with the Risk team on Organization Risk and Control Management. The role to be based out of Chennai location. Business Function Process CoE team work closely with the EQ India Operation and EQ Group functions across UK and US in driving the initiatives to optimize end-to-end processes across the organization. Estabilishing a culture of continuous improvement and helping the organization to manage the operations efficiently through robust control frameworks and process standardization. Core Duties and Responsibilities Understand and create standardized process flows using BPMN standards. Identify opportunities to optimize end-to-end processes across the organization as per BPMN standards. Work closely with the operations and transition team, to understand the migrating processes. Review the process to identify potential gaps while coming up with process flows. Ensure that control measures are effectively integrated into daily process flows. While mapping the processes, look for the effectiveness of controls, make recommendations for improvements as needed. Perform trend analysis to anticipate potential challenges and implement preventive measures to mitigate. Support the operations and risk teams in implementing robust control frameworks to mitigate identified risks. Periodically review with Operations to update the revised processes and controls that the processes have underwent. Take lead in implementing continuous improvement intiatives, proactively identify opportunities for enhancement. Ensure the implementation of reviewed and revised processes and controls by the respective stakeholders. Competencies and Experience The candidate should posses the following experience, skills and behaviours: Bachelors degree in Business administration, Finance, Information Technology, or a relevant field. 6 to 8 years of experience with minimum 3 to 4 years as a Business Process Analyst or in a similar role. Hands on experience and certification in using business process mapping tools is a plus (e.g., IBM Blueworks, Aris, Igraffx) Strong understanding of business process management and notation (BPMN) methodologies and tools. Proficiency and certification in process modeling and analysis techniques is required (e.g., BPMN, Six Sigma, Lean). In-depth knowledge about work/process standardization, risk identification and controls. Experience with process automation, workflow management, or business process management systems is a plus. Knowledge of agile methodologies and project management principles will be an added advantage. ? Being a permanent member of the team at EQ you will be rewarded by our company benefits, these are just a few of what is on offer: 2 way transport provided 3 days of additional leaves on & above statutory requirement along with 2 days of voluntary leaves to pursue the CSR initiatives?? Business related certification expense reimbursement Comprehensive Medical Assurance coverage for dependents & Parents Cab transport for staff working in UK & US shift Accidental & Life cover 3 times of concerned CTC

column2: Job Title : AVP Model Performance Validation Location: Noida About Barclays Barclays is a British universal bank. We are diversified by business, by different types of customers and clients, and by geography. Our businesses include consumer banking and payments operations around the world, as well as a top-tier, full service, global corporate and investment bank, all of which are supported by our service company which provides technology, operations and functional services across the Group. column2: Develop and execute comprehensive collections strategies to optimize the recovery process and reduce delinquency rates. Conduct regular projections and forecasts of collections targets based on historical data, industry trends, and business objectives. Utilize advanced analytics techniques to analyze collection data, identify patterns, and extract actionable insights. Develop and maintain effective management information systems (MIS) for the collections department, ensuring accurate and timely reporting of key metrics. Monitor collection performance metrics, such as roll rates, collection efficiency, and days sales outstanding (DSO), to identify areas for improvement and drive strategic initiatives. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including credit, risk, and operations, to ensure alignment of collection strategies with overall business goals. Design and implement collection scorecards and key performance indicators (KPIs) to track and measure the effectiveness of collection efforts. Conduct regular reviews of collection policies and procedures, recommending enhancements and implementing best practices. Provide guidance and support to collection teams, offering training and coaching to enhance their performance and adherence to collection strategies. Collaborate with technology teams to leverage automation and data analytics tools to improve collections processes and efficiency. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, regulatory changes, and best practices in collections strategies and technology solutions. Present collection strategies, insights, and recommendations to senior management and stakeholders, ensuring clear communication of goals and progress. Monitor external collection agency performance, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and performance expectations. Qualifications: Proven experience as a Collections Strategy Manager or in a similar role, preferably within the financial services industry. Strong expertise in collections strategies, including projections, forecasting, analytics, and MIS management. In-depth knowledge of collection processes, industry regulations, and best practices. Proficiency in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Tableau, Power BI) to analyze large datasets and extract meaningful insights. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and translate insights into actionable strategies. Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple initiatives simultaneously.

column2: Job Title :  Underwriter Location State :  Telangana Location City :  Hyderabad Experience Required :  1 to 10 Year(s) Shift:  US Shift Work Mode:  Work from Home Position Type:  Permanent Openings:  10 Company Name:  VARITE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED About The Client:  Leading global services company that offers a comprehensive suite of business process outsourcing solutions. With expertise in finance and accounting, technology, and digital transformation, We helps businesses streamline operations, improve efficiency, and drive growth. Through innovative solutions and a client-centric approach, We empowers organizations to achieve their strategic objectives and stay ahead in today's competitive marketplace. About The Job: Responsible for identifying and indexing various Mortgage loan documents in sixty-plus pre-defined categories. Order services, which include but are not limited to Appraisal, Flood Determination Certificate, VOD/VOR/VOM as required, Tax transcripts, SSA-89, Home Insurance, Prelim Report. Essential Job Functions: Performs full review of mortgage applications and verifies the accuracy of information entered into processing systems. Analyze borrowers' credit profile, collateral and capacity to repay the proposed mortgage obligation. Perform a thorough analysis of the applicant's income and expense data, self-employment documentation, credit reports, and property valuations to affirm that the borrower qualifies for the loan. Interpret credit policy guidelines and investor guidelines (all FNMA, FHLMC, FHA, VA & USDA) and apply them to specific loans for effective sale in the secondary market. Accurately calculate borrowers' income and debt-to-income ratios Quickly making decisions on the borrower's creditworthiness based on underwriting guidelines. Assembles documents in the loan file, approves or rejects loan applications or requests additional information within the reasonable time frame to the originating mortgage loan officer. Records loan rejection, specifying investor and guidelines and basis for declining applications. Understands policy and procedures for approving loans, loan-to-value (LTV), and debt-to-income (DTI) ratios by using income, assets, and property appraisals, and uses sound judgment on applications reviewed. Responsible for identifying various Mortgage loan documents and indexing them in sixty-plus pre-defined categories. Intelligent data capture from source documents as per defined business rules Order services include but are not limited to Appraisal, Flood Determination Certificate, VOD/VOR/VOM as required, Tax transcripts, SSA-89, Home insurance, and preliminary report. Review and update information in the Loan Originating System (LOS) as per submission documents. Update information in LOS if a discrepancy exists. Perform compliance check. Notify the Client Processing team of completion. Error Analysis Publishing Quality Dashboard Meeting goals as per the defined key result areas Maintaining track of daily processed transactions and reporting in a timely and accurate manner to the Process Supervisor / Team lead Appearing and qualifying all periodic process assessments with defined benchmark scores Adherence to process SLAs Best practice sharing Help in cascading process updates. Qualifications: Three years of US underwriting experience with knowledge of FHA, VA and conventional Mortgage underwriting in a bank or mortgage company environment Should possess in-depth knowledge of critical documents used for a mortgage transaction, such as appraisal reports, title commitments, and all types of income documents, including personal and business tax returns. Thorough knowledge of the required credit criteria of the assigned loan products and channel of business Excellent written communication skills with proper grammar, able to summarize crisp and clear requirements. Good computer skills, particularly with Excel and Word Strong attention to detail and multi-tasking abilities Expert knowledge of Desktop Underwriter (DU) & Loan Prospector (LP) Extensive knowledge of all mortgage loan documentation Categorical understanding of the mortgage lending process Ability to carry out requisite loan calculations (DTI, LTV, etc.) Capable of preparing reports of findings Ability to handle multiple files simultaneously. Perform well in team environments. Education Qualification Graduate and or Postgraduate Science/ Commerce graduates Medium of education: English How to Apply:  Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume using the apply online button on this job post. About VARITE:  VARITE is a global staffing and IT consulting company providing technical consulting and team augmentation services to Fortune 500 Companies in USA, UK, CANADA and INDIA. VARITE is currently a primary and direct vendor to the leading corporations in the verticals of Networking, Cloud Infrastructure, Hardware and Software, Digital Marketing and Media Solutions, Clinical Diagnostics, Utilities, Gaming and Entertainment, and Financial Services. column2: Job Title: Market Risk Analyst Corporate Grade: AVP Location: Mumbai About Barclays Barclays is a British universal bank. We are diversified by business, by different types of customers and clients, and by geography. Our businesses include consumer banking and payments operations around the world, as well as a top-tier, full service, global corporate and investment bank, all of which are supported by our service company which provides technology, operations and functional services across the Group. Risk and Control Objective Take ownership for managing risk and strengthening controls in relation to the work you do. Working Flexibly Were committed to providing a supportive and inclusive culture and environment for you to work in. This environment recognises and supports ways to balance your personal needs, alongside the professional needs of our business. Providing the opportunity for all our employees, globally to work flexibly empowers each of us to work in a way that suits our lives as well as enabling us to better service our customers??and clients??needs. Whether you have family commitments or you??e a carer, or whether you need study time or wish to pursue personal interests, our approach to working flexibly is designed to help you balance your life. ?If you would like some flexibility, then please discuss this with the hiring manager, and your request will be reviewed subject to business needs Hybrid Working Structured hybrid role: ? ? At Barclays, we offer a hybrid working experience that blends the positives of working alongside colleagues at our onsite locations, together with working from home. ?We have a structured approach where colleagues work at an onsite location on fixed, ??nchor?? days of the week, for a minimum of two days a week or more, as set by the business area (or nearest equivalent if working part-time hours). Please discuss the working pattern requirements for the role you are applying for with the hiring manager. Please note that as we continue to embed our hybrid working environment, we remain in a test and learn phase, which means that working arrangements may be subject to change on reasonable notice to ensure we meet the needs of our business. Introduction: As a Barclays Market Risk Manager you will be a part of the Market Risk Management team, covering trading desks. You will provide additional and independent information to the business to enhance decision making, whilst providing a control environment which satisfies the objectives set by the regulators.? The role is within the Market Risk Management team located in Mumbai, integrated with Market Risk Management. Key responsibilities include data validation and management for VaR sign offs, Stress, RNiVand IRC computation, FRTB integration and over view of Top Risks across different desks of Securitized Prodcuts What will you be doing?  ? ?Participate and contribute to weekly team discussions on market moves and how they affect investment risks held by the business.? ??? ?Ensuring accurate and timely data for daily signoff of risk, stress, and VaR/SVaR figures, for accurate market risk capture and risk reporting for Securitized Products (SP) within Market Risk ??? ?Full awareness of FRTB landscape and regulations impacting desk? ??? ?Hierarchy and book management within Sec Prods & proactive tracking and fixing of data issues which feed into the risk systems for SP including managing One Risk transition ??? ?Daily monitoring and sign off of exposures including stresses, and utilization against limits, as well as additional ad-hoc analysis, e.g. P&L arising from market moves, escalation of overages as appropriate ??? ?Reviewing VaR and non-VaR limits, as well as scenarios shocks, on a periodic basis ??? ?Handle Top-Risks and market commentaries on rotation with Global Risk Managers ??? ?Handling enquiries and ad hoc requests from regulators or senior management ??? ?Facilitating submission of Risk Reports, LE level reports and attestation of controls including BCBS239 What we??e looking for:  ? ?Sound knowledge of derivative markets, products and pricing and process flows for data management ??? ?Ability to handle multiple priorities and operate autonomously? ??? ?Bachelor?? Masters Degree with educational background in a quantitative discipline, eg Risk, Finance, Business (or CFA/FRM) ??? ?Analytical and IT skills are required (Excel/VBA) to build tools that will help in carrying out the responsibilities in this role.? ??? ?Min 3 years of experience in Market Risk Management/ Market Risk Reporting function Skills that will help you in the role:  ? ?Excellent interpersonal skills and communication skills, with confidence to manage matrix relationships ??? ?Technology proficiency in any of these languages: Python, SQL, VBA, C, C++, Java ?? ??? ?Ability to work and collaborate in a team Where will you be working? Mumbai

column2: About Branch Banking: The branches act as the face of Axis Bank for millions of retail customers and is, hence, an integral part of the Banks strategy. Branches play a major role in deposit mobilization from New-To-Bank (NTB) customers, and are also core drivers of the Bank customer engagement strategy across products and services. About the Role: The Relationship Manager will be responsible for nurturing client relationships through continuous client engagements and risk profiling. The RM will be responsible for identification of potential customers and providing them customized solutions as per their requirements. The position entails client management and acquisition with a key focus on expanding the Asset under Management. Key capabilities include working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment with cross-functional teams to design, collaborate with multiple stakeholders and provide tailored investment products aligned to customer needs. The center of all client engagements will be to ensure superior customer experience Key Responsibilities : Provide financial solutions to the Priority customers while maintaining high service standards Maintain complete customer profile including the risk profile, demographics and assets in the bank Enrich relationships and garner higher wallet share through customer engagement activities Deepen the existing relationships by cross selling the Bank's products and services/ third party investment products Identify potential customers who can be sold tailored products to enhance product penetration Acquire new customers by converting referral leads Achieve targets as assigned by the organization on a monthly basis Record and track all engagement activities through the CRM system Comply with KYC/SEBI rules, regulations, and legislation governing the Bank Qualifications: Optimal qualification for success on the job is: Graduation/ Post graduation from a recognized institute 6-10 years managing High Net worth clients Role Proficiencies: For successful execution of the job, the candidate should possess the following: Knowledge of banking products and services Ability to manage complex client situations Good communication (both verbal and written) skill in both English and the local language Ability to handle pressure and meet deadlines Good networking and relationship building skills #ComeAsYouAre 'We are dil se open. Women, LGBTQIA+ and PwD candidates of all ages are encouraged to apply' Industry Banking Employment Type Full-time

Minimum 2 years of experience in vocational education in the BFSI sector   Demonstrated experience in tailoring educational content to meet the current and evolving needs of the industry.  Demonstrated experience in coordinating and organizing industry guest talks, providing students with insights into current industry trends, challenges, and opportunities. Required Skills:  Analytical mindset, adaptability, and organizational skills for effective industry engagement.  Proven ability to align programs with industry standards and regulations.  Strong collaboration and communication skills with educators and industry stakeholders.  Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.   Proficiency in English, Hindi, and preferably Punjabi. Key Responsibilities :  Develop and implement strategies to align vocational education programs with industry standards, regulations, and best practices.  Collaborate with curriculum developers, educators, and other stakeholders to ensure that educational content meets the current and evolving needs of the industry.  Organise and manage effective On-the-Job Training (OJT) programs, coordinating with industry partners to provide students with hands-on experience. Work collaboratively with curriculum developers, educators, and industry stakeholders to foster strong relationships.  Actively seek opportunities for internships and apprenticeships in collaboration with industry partners.  Maintain regular and open communication with industry partners to stay informed about industry requirements, trends, and potential opportunities for students. column1: Opening For Analyst, Custom Calculation Services.
column2: ISS STOXX is seeking an analyst to join our Custom Calculation Services team within the Index Operations Group in  Mumbai, India Overview: The Custom Calculation Services team, part of the Index Operations Group in ISS STOXX, is seeking an analyst. The candidate will be responsible for the configuration, calculation and dissemination of custom indices. The candidate is expected to play a role in liaising with ISS STOXX Clients and facilitate the launch of new products. The successful candidate will also work in close collaboration with various ISS STOXX stakeholders to ensure best practice and compliance to Operations Group policies, and in the definition of new processes based on clients requirements. This is an excellent opportunity for the right candidate to join a high-performance team, actively support this activity by applying knowledge and skills to a large number of routine and non-routine activities, and also becoming involved in a new, interesting and challenging projects.? Responsibilities: 0-2 yrs expereince Develop subject matter expertise on index set-up and maintenance, markets impacts and anticipate market expectations. Ensure the accuracy of daily index calculation for customised equity and strategy indices. Monitor configuration of indices to ensure that corporate actions adjustments for equities and ?periodic reviews of the custom indices are processed correctly. Supervise input data feeds according to index methodology specification, identify changes?and coordinate adjustments. Monitor and evaluate index constituents, ensuring accuracy and relevance. Identify and assess potential risks associated with index composition and market changes. Enhance or suggest new tools, specify requirements for technical development and test new applications/tools from end-to-end. Document processes and workflows for the Custom Calculation Services team. Qualifications: Hold a university degree in Finance, Economics, Mathematics or a related field. A first experience in the financial markets sector, indices, portfolio management or investment products. Has strong communication and organizational skills, capability to prioritize and follow established guidelines. The job requires the candidate to work with different teams across various time zones in a results-oriented manner, therefore flexibility is essential. Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in data interpretation Be able to work under pressure and handle multiple tasks in a time-efficient manner. ? Be able to work and learn autonomously with minimum supervision and training (self-starter/self-learner). Be a team-player, customer-focused attitude and ability to act as a proactive, team player with hands-on mentality. Knowledge of MS Office applications. VBA, Python, SQL skills is a plus. Knowledge of market data vendors (i.e. Refinitiv, Bloomberg, SIX, ICE, ...) is a plus. Fluent in English both oral and written. Knowledge/ Fluent in a second language Asian (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) or European (French, Spanish, German) would be an advantage.

column2: Job Summary:   As a Sales executive, you will be responsible for promoting and selling liability products such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposits, and recurring deposits, as well as IndusInd Bank asset products including loans and consumer finance options, tailored to meet the specific needs of customers within the BFIL segment. Additionally, cross-sell third-party products like insurance, credit cards, and demat accounts, educate customers on their benefits and assist them in making informed decisions. Build strong customer relationships through exceptional service and prompt resolution of inquiries, while maintaining accurate sales records.   Role & responsibilities     Product Sales:  The sales executive is responsible for selling a   wide range of liability products, including current accounts, savings   accounts, fixed deposits, and recurring deposits offered by the branch. They   should identify and target potential customers within the BFIL customer   segment, offering customized liability products tailored to their specific   needs and preferences. Additionally, they should actively sell IndusInd Bank   asset products.   Cross-Sell and   Third-Party Products : In   addition to core banking products, the sales executive cross-sells   third-party products such as life insurance, general insurance, health   insurance, credit cards, and demat accounts to existing and potential   customers. Educate customers about the benefits and features of cross-sell   products and assist them in making informed decisions based on their   individual needs and preferences.   Customer Relationship   and Documentation : Build and maintain strong relationships with the   customers. Provide excellent service and address customer queries and   concerns promptly to ensure customer satisfaction. Additionally, maintain   accurate records of sales activities and prepare regular sales reports and   updates for management review, enabling informed decision-making and tracking   of sales performance.   Target Achievement : Meet or exceed sales   targets for liability, asset, and cross-sell products. Implement sales   strategies to achieve sales targets within the assigned customer segments and   geographical areas.    Team Collaboration:  Collaborate with the   branch staff, including customer service representatives and operations   personnel, for seamless coordination and delivery of products and services.   The sales executive should work closely with other team members to ensure a   cohesive approach to sales and customer service. Ensure customer service by proactively communicating information, responding to inquiries, following customer protocols and special handling instructions. Ensure legal compliance by following federal laws and regulations, and internal control requirements. Job qualification and other skills/competencies Bachelors degree or college Diploma. Good knowledge of how to evaluate injuries and damage using market tools and technology. General knowledge of the coverages available under the damage protection, liability policy and some common exclusions. Results driven, ability to multi-task, pay attention to detail and follow procedures. Proven leadership and time management skills in a team environment. Good writing, communication and presentation skills.

column2: The Quantitative Investment Strategies business at Morgan Stanley sits within the Institutional Securities Group with a cross-asset mandate and is a global multi-function team consisting of dedicated Research, Structuring, Strats, and Trading. The mandate of the group is to design quantitative systematic strategies that can be offered to the firm s clients to access in a variety of formats.              This is a challenging role and offering exposure to an interesting, dynamic product group and work environment to build your career in.                 Responsibilities for this role would involve:                Work on new equity and multi-asset index development - back testing, coding, tweaking codes etc.                      Development of processes to improve index support, e.g. scripts to aid debugging, index code refactoring and standardization                      Index oversight - Daily monitoring of the complex indices & resolving calculation issues (data problems, calendar errors, common code errors etc.)                      Overseeing Index rebalance processes for client directed strategies                      Making modifications in      existing live indices e.g. new cost structures, universe changes, minor methodology adjustments                      Index Description drafting for minor adjustments, Repeat Index Launch Form completion                      Carrying out performance attribution of systematic strategies                     Production of periodic standard performance reporting for client distribution                     Development and production of position, stress, composition reports for clients                   Bespoke scenario/sensitivity analysis for clients                                 Skills required (essential)                                                Degree with a quantitative discipline (BE, BTech, MS in Maths/Statistics/Financial Engineering) from Tier 1 or 2 institutes                      1-3 year of prior exposure to Index/Quants Research and equities/multi asset indices analytics is important.                      Computer Skills: strong programming skills such as Python (mandatory), R and Java.                      Must be able to flexibly respond to changes in priorities, be able to communicate results to a less-technical audience, work well in a team and be comfortable in a front office environment.                      Strong attention to detail.                      Excellent written and verbal communication skills/Ability to express ideas via writing. Prior track record in writing marketing material/trade ideas for wider distribution will be advantageous.                      Proactiveness / Initiative taking & Teamwork                  ?

column2: Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Operations Executive to join our dynamic team at Tradejini, a leading stock broking company. The ideal candidate will have 1.5-2+ years of experience in a similar role within the stock broking industry. As an Operations Executive, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring seamless operational processes and enhancing efficiency within the organization. Responsibilities: Execute daily operational tasks efficiently, including trade processing, reconciliation, and settlement procedures. Monitor and maintain accuracy of client accounts, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements. Collaborate with internal teams to streamline operational workflows and implement process improvements. Handle inquiries and resolve issues related to trade execution, settlements, and account maintenance. Generate reports and analyze data to identify trends, discrepancies, and areas for improvement. Assist in the implementation of new systems or technologies to optimize operational efficiency. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business Administration, or related field. Proven experience of 1.5-2+ years in operations roles within the stock broking industry. Strong understanding of trade processing, settlement procedures, and regulatory compliance. Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret and analyze complex data sets. Proficiency in MS Office suite, particularly Excel, for data analysis and reporting. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and prioritize tasks effectively. Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and precision in work. Benefits: Competitive salary package Provident Fund and other benefits Opportunities for professional growth and development Dynamic and collaborative work environment

Basic knowledge of working capital finance and the ability to read balance sheets and profit and loss statements. Additional Requirements: Excellent follow-up management skills. Own vehicle with a valid driving license. Strong oral and written communication skills. Relationship management skills. column2: Job Purpose   The individual will play a key role in supporting Private   Credit team of an Asset Management client around research and content preparation. The person will closely interact with clients Private Credit team and assist them on projects across proposal management (RFPs/DDQs), presentation updates and preparation, content management (Qvidian/RocketDocs/RFPIO/Loopio),  and other ad-hoc research requests. This opportunity is ideal for private equity/private credit/investment banking professionals interested in working with   leading global private equity funds and asset management companies. The role   provides good exposure to various aspects of the private equity and private   credit industry. Role & responsibilities:   Collaborate with clients Private equity/credit team and support across a variety of research and investor relation projects. Respond to RFPs/DDQs which are critical part of equity/debt raising and ongoing due diligence process. Source/draft content with information available and/or by collaborating with various subject matter experts within the client team. Language maintenance on internally maintained repository and/or content management tools (Rocket Docs/RFPIO/PMAPS /Qvidian/Loopio) by updating the tools with accurate information. Work on fund raising support activities, marketing presentations, client reporting, lead generation etc. Coordinate with client internal and external teams to ensure flawless and timely execution of projects. Stay abreast of developments in terms of changes in clients internal structure, staffing, product performance and competitive strengths. Update and manage consultant databases. Ability to work on several tasks while adhering to deadlines. Preferred candidate profile:   Experience in and around                 - Private equity/credit/ESG strategies                 - Research around sectors / geographies / company focused investment themes and                    fund strategies                 -  Proposal/white paper writing, content management, peer analysis, fund benchmarking                     etc. MBA in Finance, Economics or Business management / CFA Strong analytical, communication (written/verbal) and client engaging skills Strong knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint  Ability to multi-task and thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment Ability to develop and maintain lasting relationships with senior professionals; good interpersonal skills; goal-oriented Ability to be a team player and contribute to the development of the team Strong work ethics, commitment to excel and proven ability to work with minimum supervision Previous experience in a similar role will be an added advantage  Perks and benefits   Competitive to the market

column2: Job Description Business Analyst     Role Description Clarifying a business idea. To understand which direction to choose, a business analyst should clarify the primary purposes of the future product. Also, a BA sets up the primary product benchmarks, such as customer acquisition strategy and value proposition, and helps decide on basic product KPIs. Then, they evaluate the most relevant means of implementation, which will be the most convenient for both stakeholders and developers. Planning development activities. When primary business requirements are already established, its necessary to shape the development direction and allocate the areas of responsibilities. At this point, product development workshops with the participation of stakeholders serve as an efficient development tool. Validating requirements. When approving the drafted documentation with business requirements included, the BA assures compliance of the development outcomes with a customer?? business goals. With both sides on the same page, everything goes in the right direction. Standardizing the software development process. One of the main BA responsibilities is to assure that the single workflow with promised requirements is applied. When the product is being developed, a BA gets feedback from stakeholders and ensures product improvements according to the obtained data. Responsibilities  1. Research business problems ??assess the business model, identify the business owner?? main points of pain or what market gap they try to fill in or expand. Feed this knowledge into the business requirements. 2. Identify the expected business value ??Understand the product?? course and the expected market niche it is intended to fill.  3. Create visualized concepts ??of how the system elements will interact with each other. This activity also includes establishing the method of interaction between the product and its target audience.  4. Draft nonfunctional requirements ??document how the system is supposed to behave. Establishes the constraints of its functionality. Include system?? quality attributes such as usability, security, reliability, performance, availability, and scalability.  5. Prepare functional requirements ??document the product features that engineers must implement to allow users to achieve their goals. Ensure documentation is clear for both developers and stakeholders.  6. Formulate the main backlog ??create an instructive to-do list, ensuring that all business aspects discussed earlier are reflected.  7. Story mapping & creation ??liaise with decision-makers, such as product/project manager, stakeholders, UX designers, and representatives of the development team. Ensure that any supposed user flow matches the approved business value.  8. Document acceptance criteria ??ensure a feature satisfies both a stakeholder and the end-user. Work with the QA team to capture their input as well.  9. Prioritize backlog items ??Working with stakeholders, realize which cluster of tasks is more important or relevant from the business point of view.  10. Set up preparation activities ??shadow the entire pre-development process to guarantee that every sprint is planned in accordance with approved requirements and goals.  11. Tracking the development process ??ensure daily routine includes the participation in daily Scrum and Standup meetings. Monitor the development process to address and accomplish all business requirements.  12. Gathering and processing feedback from customer and users ??reveal the strengths and weaknesses of the finished product from a business point of view.  13. Formulate the next backlog ??Based on gathered feedback, understand the volume of business issues to improve, change, complete, or remove.  Skills Required  1. Analytical thinker ??understand difficulties or issues, visualize them, analyze them, and then resolve them.  2. Proficient research skills, logical thinking, and presentation skills.  3. A strong background with different analytical techniques including: a. Interface Analysis b. Feasibility Analysis c. SWOT Analysis  4. Decision-maker ??acting as a middleman between stakeholders and the engineering team, make sound judgments in varied business subjects.  5. Decision-making - ability to assess a situation, including risks and benefits, receive feedback from stakeholders, and select a course of action.  6. Problem-solver ??study the problem, analyze the available options, and then suggest the best choice. Observe a problem from different angles within the business, including a target user and that of a technical expert.  7. Ability to work in a collaborative environment ??Discover Technically Viable Solutions through ongoing discussion with developers.  8. Documentation and visualization master ??make presentations to both stakeholders and developers, providing consistent requirements documentation.  9. Building wireframes ??schematic sketching and knowledge of tools such as Unifying Modeling Language are desired.

column2: About the Group The Wholesale Banking Group is responsible for maintaining relationships with and servicing large and mid-corporates with turnover ranging above ` 2.5 billion p.a. It provides end-to-end banking solutions across the financial spectrum ranging from transaction banking solutions, term loans, treasury and risk management solutions, structured products, M&A advisory and investment banking in collaboration with multiple product groups. It is also responsible for appraisal and monitoring of credit limits.  Purpose of the Job: Relationship manager is responsible for credit appraisal of the corporates and client servicing. An RM is responsible for execution of end to end set processes such as financial analysis, note making, documentation etc. for the transactions under the guidance of the Senior Relationship Manager/ Regional Head. RM also assists the Senior Relationship Manager/ Regional Head in Client servicing and portfolio management. RM is also responsible to understand & cross-sell retail liability & asset products to clients. RM is also responsible for generating new leads under the guidance of Senior Relationship Manager/ Regional Head.  Reports to: Senior Relationship Manager/ Regional Head  Key deliverables:  Credit Appraisal Relationship manager is expected to understand in detail the clients business, financials and prepare quality appraisal note in collaboration with Risk Management team.  Documentation  RM facilitates disbursement of funds once sanction is in place through coordination with various internal groups. RM is also expected to complete post-disbursement documentation activities in coordination with control groups such as Legal, Compliance, Credit Middle Office.  Portfolio management Assist the Senior Relationship Manager/ Regional Head in managing a high quality portfolio of corporate clients  Support the Senior Relationship Manager/ Regional Head in achieving business targets, acquiring and onboarding new clients  Understand & cross-sell various retail asset & liability products to capture entire ecosystem of corporate clients  Key skills:  Understanding of financial statements such as Balance sheet, P&L A/c & Cash flow statements  Knowledge of computation of key financial ratios  Knowledge of Basic Banking products  Communication and presentation skills  Basic working knowledge of Word, Excel and PPT  Competencies:  Collaboration (Forges understanding with others and carries others along, considers impact on the organization, not just own targets/metrics, and acts accordingly)  Passion (Constantly raises the bar for self & team, has a strong execution bias, takes initiatives even in the face of significant difficulties)  Organization Capability (Builds structures, systems and processes to support strategy, focuses on productivity as a business lever, sets personal example in driving quality for achieving world-class service delivery) Qualification & Experience:  CA / MBA Finance with relevant experience

column2: About Role: As a Transaction Manager in our company, the candidate will be responsible for overseeing the end-to-end conversion of individual transaction from various clients across different bank limits. The candidate will need to ensure that the transactions are carried out seamlessly within the scheduled TAT and budget. The candidate will also be required to periodically update seniors/management personnel, and clients on any prospective transaction-related changes and/or deviations. To ensure success as a Transaction manager, you should have a complete understanding of the products, process, and be able to proactively spot any transactional challenges and solve them as quickly as possible. Ultimately, a top-notch Transaction manager should demonstrate mastery of the Transaction process to minimize any associated costs or risks.   Key Responsibilities: Closely interacting with the users on the client (supplier/buyer) side to post bills/invoices on the platform. Handhold the buyers and MSME suppliers on the procedure and documentation required to upload and accept the bills/invoices. Most of the communication and correspondence with the clients is expected to happen over mail/phone. Analysing any requests for changes in transaction documents/ process flow and consulting with management to deny or approve the proposed changes. Estimating, projecting, and preparing plans for discounting of bills/invoices daily. Creating Transactional plans and documents to outline expectations, scope, schedule, and budget requirements. Coordinating with the internal teams (Banking teams) to ensure timely and suitable bids from Banks/financers. Co-ordinating with the users at client end (Buyers), our RMs, and Banking teams to get the bids placed by financers accepted by the clients for processing/disbursement. Keeping all parties involved with the Transaction updated on its progress by Producing and maintaining summary reports for scheduled and completed transactions. Monitor leads provided by customers carefully and make sure smooth on boarding.   Requirements: Any Bachelor's degree or Master Degree.  At least 1-2 year experience in Transaction management and handling digital transactions. Awareness of trade finance, supply chain finance and related transactions and associated documentation, tools, and templates. Good interpersonal skills

column2: Role & Responsibilities:- Position: Relationship Manager/ Sr Relationship Manager Job Description: Provide and develop solutions and suggest schemes to clients basis their requirements and goal. Conduct timely and regular follow ups with the leads and tag them on broadcasts and new articles. Increase client database by meeting new clients and taking references from the existing ones and hence build AUM. Review and diversify existing client portfolio on a regular basis and provide guidance accordingly. Achieve financial goals of the clients through various product lines. Update and cross sell products to existing clients and update them about the primary and secondary market trends. Update self-regarding all schemes, products and solutions by regularly attending trainings. Share regular communications with client regarding information, research and material of the organization.  Conduct regular marketing activities with the regional marketing and product team by showcasing our products and features and generate leads. Knowledge: Product Knowledge have a detailed knowledge of all products related to Life Insurance, general insurance, fixed income, mutual funds, etc Wealth/ Portfolio Management understand client portfolio in terms of their risk and reward appetite and assist them to achieve their financial goals Financial planning/ Investment Advisory have thorough financial and sector knowledge as well knowledge of competitors, must provide sound and reliable advice to clients. Skills: Social/Interpersonal Skills: Should have excellent socializing and relation building skills. Communication Skills: Should have excellent communicating and listening skills, ability to explain complex information clearly and in a simplified manner. Should be a confident individual and must conduct and present themselves well in front of client Analytical Skills: Is able to analyse the requirement of the clients basis their financial goals and have strong logical and numerical ability. Work to achieve targets: Has ability to deal with stress and follow procedures. Has good emotional stability and conscientiousness when dealing with achieving targets. Should always identify opportunities for greater profit Compliance: follows the guidelines and compliance needs and be closely monitored and response to any request for documentation. Preferred candidate profile: Desired Candidate Profile- Candidate Should have minimum 4 to 8 years of experience in Wealth Management, Financial Planning & Investment Advisory Space, Should have exposure in all Wealth Instrument Like Insurance, Mutual Fund, PMS , AIF etc. Perks and benefits Half yearly appraisals + Monthly incentives+ Travel and mobile recharge reimbursement allowances CTC- 3 LPA - 8 LPA Location- Navi Mumbai (Kharghar),Rajkot Interested Candidates can mail there resume to  shreya.shetty@bajajcapital.com

column1: Account Management Specialist- Liability Insurance Practice
column2: PlanCover makes commercial insurance simple. Our deep industry expertise powered by a consultative approach combines the best policy coverage with the right pricing that fit customer needs.  Our digital platform provides a better way for businesses to buy and manage insurance. We have provided customised business insurance solutions to over hundreds of businesses and have been rated as one of the promising and innovative commercial insurance brokerages by leading insurance partners.  We are helping businesses plan for tomorrow, so they can change the world today. Are you in? Who are we specifically looking for?  We are looking for young, dynamic and result oriented legal professionals to join us in our growing Liability insurance practice.  As part of this practice you will use the knowledge acquired as a lawyer to help clients better understand their risks, exposures and be a strong advocate for them at the time of any claim/litigation.  Ambitious, hungry for business, challenges assumptions and impatient  Entrepreneurial: You will be building a robust scalable business, so courage and bold      creative thinking is rewarded. You are organised, extremely hand-on using technology, and navigate the internet and social platforms with ease to engage with prospective customers Loves problem solving and come up with solutions  If you are available right away, you need to write to us on careers@plancover.com   Please go through the Linkedin Profile of PlanCover and know more about the nature of our work.   https://tinyurl.com/522chmce Role & responsibilities:   You will champion the growth of our liability insurance portfolio including: Product liability, Technology IP,  Directors liability, Cyber risk and M&As.  Acquire new clients by offering best advice, valuable insight and risk management services across industries.  Will be advising clients on review of contracts, documentation, assistance in drafting MSAs, and other compliances against insurance requirements.  Gap analysis of the existing policies, suggesting better terms and negotiating the same with the insurers. Ensure creation and compliance of the internal sales process  Be the voice of the customer to articulate feedback clearly to internal teams Preferred candidate profile:   You have an educational background in law and experience with a firm preferably in cyberlaw, technology and professional services practice You have an experience of 2-4 years of B2B selling experience preferably in      consulting Understanding of liability insurances, contracting and MSAs is a real welcome  Familiarity with technology and high growth industry business is desirable Excellent Communication and presentation skills Perks and benefits   When you join PlanCover.com:  Youre joining a company that values career development, collaboration, innovation, and inclusiveness.  Feel proud about being part of a company that is committed to doing the right thing.  Youll have the opportunity to grow your career while developing personally and      professionally through various resources and programs. Start-up learning experiences Fun, Collaborative environment with a flat structure. Risk and rewards compensation matching industry-best.

column1: Senior Vice President and Head IT - Small Finance Bank
column2: Location: Navi Mumbai Client: Top 3 Small Finance Bank   SVP - Head IT  Head IT Service Strategy is crucial in shaping an organizations technology direction and ensuring alignment with business goals. Demonstrated ability in managing large, complex and multiple projects, transformation and strategy in the Banking & Finance Sector and delivering them on time and budget. The Head of Digital Services will need to be an exceptional hands-on Project Manager, but also have outstanding management skills and ability to lead experienced Project, Engineering and Support Teams. You will proactively manage a team of direct reports comprising of Engineering Heads. The focus for this role will be the efficient management of personnel including being a point of escalation, helping to mitigate project risks, as well as actively managing your own project portfolio. Create a positive rapport with prospects and existing clients. Lead, help and direct the Project, Support and Engineering Leads Engage with end users and other stakeholders to ensure smooth project delivery on time as well as helping to build key, long lasting relationships and develop effective collaborative working at a senior level. Be willing to challenge/remove blockers that stop the projects team successfully completing their jobs from internal or external factors.  Be flexible and prepared to wear more than one hat when necessary. Communicate effectively and in a timely fashion with clients and colleagues.  Provide accurate and regular updates to all stakeholders throughout Be Aware of Regulatory as well as Information Security Requirements and ensure that they are implemented. Key Responsibilities include: Collaborate with Service Leads and IT Strategy & Transformation Leads to develop infrastructure and service management strategies. Manage a program of related projects, ensuring they collectively achieve larger objectives. Assess current and future demand for infrastructure services and recommend a mulit-year plan for capacity and source distribution.  Develop business cases to support recommendations and lead a team of Business Relationship Managers Accountable for integrated project planning and execution to deliver the Infrastructure Services Strategy program within agreed time, cost, and quality criteria. Work closely with the Head of Infrastructure & Service Management, IT Project Delivery, and other stakeholders. Collaborate directly with the Senior Executive team to design, develop, and implement IT strategies aligned with corporate vision and goals. Assist the CIO for IT Strategy & Transformation in critical thinking, research, analysis, communication, and change management. Create clear and concise communications/recommendations for senior leadership related to strategic business plans and initiatives. Lead Technology Architecture and Standards team providing Strategic Direction Lead IT Service Management Team providing Strategic direction and act as point of escalation.

Develop control functions using model-based development techniques. c. Generate code from MATLAB/Simulink models for series software development. d. Proficiency in control system development and testing using MATLAB, Simulink, and TargetLink. 2. Familiarity with model-based development and verification processes. 3. Basic programming skills in C. 4. Experience in validation techniques such as MiL, SiL, and HiL. 5. Understanding of automotive control systems and their development lifecycle. Professional Attributes: a. Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members. b. Strong teamwork and collaboration abilities. c. Attention to detail and ability to work in a structured manner. d. Adaptability to changing project requirements and priorities. e. Demonstrated ability to work effectively within project timelines. f. Willingness to learn and continuously improve technical skills. g. Ability to work independently and take initiative when needed. Additional Information: Prior experience with model-based development processes for series software development is desirable. Experience working with electric vehicle systems, including control software, Electronic Control Units (ECUs), and plant models, is a plus.Role & responsibilities

column2: Oracle Supplier Management Analyst  Corporate Technology Company Profile LSEG (London Stock Exchange Group)  is a world-leading financial markets infrastructure and data business.  We are dedicated, open-access partners with a commitment to excellence in delivering services across Data & Analytics, Capital Markets, and Post Trade.  Backed by three hundred years of experience, innovative technologies, and a team of over 23,000 people in 70 countries, our purpose is driving financial stability, empowering economies, and enabling customers to create sustainable growth. Working in partnership with  Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) , we are excited to expand our  tech centres of excellence  in India, by building a new  global centre , right here in the heart of Hyderabad. Role Profile In this role, you'll be joining our (Finance Technology team) within  Corporate Technology (CT) . The team serves as a bridge between Corporate Technology and LSEG central engineering, operations and compliance teams with the key focus of enabling our CT. We are seeking a skilled and motivated  Oracle Supplier Management Analyst  to join our Corporate Finance Technology Delivery function. As an Oracle Supplier Management Analyst, you will be responsible for configuring, maintaining, and supporting the Oracle Procurement module within our organization with your primary focus to ensure the successful deployment of the Supplier Management functionality globally and to collaborate across the source to pay workstreams to focus on the end-to-end implementation phases of Oracle ERP solution working in an agile environment. The position requires solid technical/functional understanding as well as verbal and written communication skills with proven ability to clearly communicate technical information to non-technical audience. To be successful the Oracle Supplier Management Analyst shall complete all deliverables to the highest quality standards followed at LSEG using standards and best business practices to ensure the solution is scalable to meet its current and future needs.  Tech Profile/Essential Skills Proficiency in Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) or Oracle Cloud Procurement modules :   Oracle Supplier Portal or iSupplier Supplier Qualification Management Oracle Business Network Procurement (including Self Service). Purchasing. Functional Setup Manager (FSM) Oracle Cloud Reporting tools.  Preferred Skills and Experience 8 years      of experience in Oracle Applications, with at least 2 end-to-end      implementations in Oracle ERP. Proficiency      in Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) or Oracle      Cloud Procurement modules :   Accounts Payable Cash Management Subledger Accounting General Ledger. Strong      experience working with Oracle Supplier Management module, including      configuration, customization, and support. In-depth      understanding of supplier data management principles, processes, and best      practices. Global      experience - Working successfully with teams in multiple locations      simultaneously.  Experience      and knowledge of large scale, global, change programs.  Experience      in large investment banking or financial services organisations. Background      in working across several different sectors both business and IT related      projects/programs.  Knowledge      of technology estates and technologies desirable.

column2: Roles and Responsibilities Home Loan Responsible for building and development of internal team and external channel partners. Responsible for achieving the sales and cross-sell targets, customer satisfaction, productivity and thus enhance profitability through the team of DSTs and individually responsible for handling DSA business. Responsible for establishing the Piramal brand and managing the sales and business development activities for Home Loan in the affordable segment. Smooth functioning of lending process at the various stages such as inquiry, application, verification, pre-sanction processing of loan, sanction, post-sanction documentation, disbursement of loan, collection, new and existing customer service. The incumbent is required to have a good knowledge and understanding of the local affordable markets and PMAY.  Knowledge of compliance regulations as issued by NHB, RBI and the company. Incorporate these requirements into the business processes and procedures. Periodic self assessments including corrective action as needed and ensure appropriate training of the team regarding the same. Responsible for knowing and complying with all the legal requirements as per the law of the land. Follows effective controls and processes to ensure risks are measured, monitored and controlled on an on-going basis. Responsible for the collection and recovery in the lending portfolio along with the collections and credit team. Responsible for relationship building with builder for APF & bulk sales. Ensure proper training and review at the builders site so that they are aligned with company's processes and policies. Ensure team has been adequately trained and performs all functions in accordance with the regulatory requirements such as but not limited to NHB, RBI etc. Model and foster behaviors that support the organizations values and corporate culture creating an atmosphere of trust, cooperation, accountability and dedication to the organization. Monitor individual & team performance and take steps to improve productivity and correct aberrations.  Ensuring that the engagement and motivation levels are high in the team. Ensuring the collaboration and conflict resolution of team with the other cross functional teams. Ensure excellent customer service which includes query resolution of the customer, completion of the task within the given TAT, after sales service, complaint handling and customer retention.  Being updated with the changing market scenario and provide suggestions for improvement in the products, policies and processes. Desired Candidate Profile   Ability to liaison & follow-up with external and internal stakeholders.  Good written & verbal communication skills Experience of recruiting and training of sales team and channel partners. Ability to work under tight deadlines  Graduate from a reputed college Perks and Benefits   Mediclaim Insurance to employee and entire family Best in Industry CTC with Travel and Mobile allowance Sales Incentives Per Month Interested candidates  send  updated resume  to Padma.chityala@piramal.com   Thanks & Regards,  padma.chityala@piramal.com

column2: Role: Relationship Sales Manager Location: Nungambakkam Chennai Role & responsibilities  :   Prospecting and Lead Generation: Identify and generate leads through various channels, including referrals, real estate partnerships, and marketing campaigns. Develop and maintain a pipeline of potential clients interested in home loan products. Client Consultation and Sales: Meet with prospective clients to understand their financial needs and homeownership goals. Explain different home loan products, features, benefits, and terms to clients. Provide personalized loan options and assist clients in choosing the best product for their needs. Loan Application Assistance: Guide clients through the home loan application process, helping them gather and complete necessary documentation. Ensure accurate and timely submission of loan applications to underwriting. Relationship Building: Establish and maintain strong relationships with real estate agents, builders, and other industry professionals to generate referral business. Attend networking events, open houses, and community functions to promote home loan products. Sales Targets and Reporting: Achieve or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets set by the institution. Prepare and submit regular sales reports, including lead generation, conversion rates, and sales performance. Customer Service: Provide excellent customer service throughout the loan process, addressing client inquiries and resolving issues promptly. Follow up with clients post-loan approval to ensure satisfaction and encourage referrals. Market Awareness: Stay informed about industry trends, competitor products, and changes in lending regulations. Provide feedback to management on market conditions and client needs.

column1: Branch Manager in a Leading Stock Broking MNC
column2: Roles and Responsibilities   1) Job Purpose To manage and drive business and branch profitability for Broking and 3rd party products Sales by achieving business growth, revenues, brand differentiation & client satisfaction through effective client acquisition & product sales and service. The product portfolio includes broking products & services and other investment products like mutual funds, life insurance, general insurance, fixed deposits & bonds. 2) Principal Accountability To deliver strong sales growth and profitability in the branch   # To drive the sales targets for the branch and build teams as per company's annual target and over all objectives # To maximize branch profits by achieving targeted fee income & effective cost management # To effectively deploy schemes & prioritize sales of high revenue products # To plan and execute various local level initiatives to ensure business momentum and direction # To monitor individual and team performance and take steps to improve productivity and correct deviations if any To effectively manage day to day branch administration and operations  # To monitor and foster all daily operations of the branch # To handle a team of Dealers, Relationship managers and Back office executives and motivate them in target achievements # To manage operations, broking and other product sales, customer service, and risk management in the branch # To monitor client servicing metrics, develop relationship marketing programs & motivate SMs & channel partners to display highest levels of client servicing standards # To send periodic reports to HO for market share analytics for different product lines, sales volume & fee income, new product launches, new clients, new channel partner/cross-sell tie-ups & changes/improvement in business plans # To ensure security of the physical assets of the branch # To oversee and ensure adherence to the Risk compliance and Statutory compliance policies To execute the Client acquisition and Client engagement drives for achieving budgeted targets # To set and monitor process for client acquisition and institutionalize cross selling of financial products # To plan and execute local area programs and referrals programs for new client acquisition # To disseminate research based advisory services to clients based on recommendations given by In-house Research team. # To engage in new and innovative business planning activities locally to increase client acquisition and Branch profitability # To focus on retention of customers , higher revenue generation and referral activities # To continuously scan the local market penetration & competitive offerings & report on emerging trends for different product lines  # To ensure proper implementation and usage of Lead management system (LMS) & IMS at the branch in coordination with HO team # To ensure client records are up to date in terms of financial details & contactability and run data analytics on them on periodic basis # To ensure speedy resolution of client queries and grievances to maximize satisfaction levels # To ensure acquisition of margin trade funding ( MTF) and trader customers with necessary margins # To continuously scan the local market penetration & competitive offerings & report on emerging trends for different product lines  To instill multi product sales focus  # To ensure multi product targets are attained at the branch. # To regularly attend trainings and learn about the alternate products offered and ensure all branch employees attend training & are aware of alternate products # To increase business through cross-selling initiatives & innovative product mixes # To use alternate products to activate inactive customers  To ensure effective risk management & policy adherence  # To ensure adequate compliance to KYC norms, processes & documentation for client profiling # To ensure adherence of all regulatory compliances & critical policies set by HO To ensure skill enhancement and team development of resources  # To develop a dedicated team with specialized skill-sets mapped to customer segments # To manage branch attrition # To ensure that requisite product & behavioral trainings are imparted in the branches in conjunction with the HR dept  3) Job Purpose of Direct Reports   a)  Dealers:  To punch equity deals for clients as per their requirements, to disseminate research recommendations to clients and ensuring compliance and regulatory standards are met. b)  Relationship Managers:  To increase the business & profitability by marketing / selling targeted financial products and services to the customers, creating new clients by effective networking and promoting product propositions & retaining clients by strong customer relationship management c)  Back Office Executives : To foster enhancement of brand value & customer satisfaction by effective client servicing & relationship management Desired Candidate Profile   The critical skill sets required to meet these challenges are excellent implementation skills, strong business and analytical skills, strong product knowledge, superior communication skills, integration and controlling skills, people management skills, a strong local network and high target and customer service orientation. The education & experience required to fulfill this profile are a Post - Graduate or an MBA with minimum 6-8 yrs of experience in selling financial services products and managing branch administration # Currently must be managing a team in any leading stock broking co. # Handling a team of Retail Sales/PCG/HNI. # High level of knowledge in stock market. # Excellent personality and a team management skill. Perks and Benefits   + Attractive incentives.
